_comment_address: a transparent address to send coinbase rewards to and to transfer to zAddress.
_comment_zAddress: a private address used to send coins to tAddress.
_comment_tAddress: transparent address used to send payments, make this a different address, otherwise payments will not send
_comment_walletInterval: This is for transfering coins from the coinbase address, to the zAddress, and then to the tAddress. Zcash's code requires this so you can't track where coins came from

paymentProcessing._comment_paymentInterval: It would be a good idea to keep this 10-20 minutes after the walletInterval to prevent the paymentInterval from spending unconfirmed coins
